solution.title: InteriMed: Your specialized healthcare staffing solution
solution.focus: Focus on what matters most - Your business, your patients, you
solution.description: InteriMed is developing a specialized digital platform to connect Healthcare facilities (initially community pharmacies in French-speaking Switzerland) with qualified healthcare professionals. InteriMed addresses critical staffing shortages in healthcare and the growing demand for flexible work among healthcare professionals by providing an efficient, compliant, and user-friendly solution
solution.keyBenefit: Focus on what matters most - patient care, not administrative burden
